table_description: WorkflowRun represents a repository action workflow run

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: Full name of the repository that specifies the workflow run.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unque identifier of the workflow run.

columns.name: event
columns.description: The event for which workflow triggered off.

columns.name: workflow_id
columns.description: The workflow id of the worflow run.

columns.name: node_id
columns.description: The node id of the worflow run.

columns.name: conclusion
columns.description: The conclusion for workflow run.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the worflow run.

columns.name: run_number
columns.description: The number of time workflow has run.

columns.name: artifacts_url
columns.description: The address for artifact GitHub web page.

columns.name: cancel_url
columns.description: The address for workflow run cancel GitHub web page.

columns.name: check_suite_url
columns.description: The address for the workflow check suite GitHub web page.

columns.name: head_branch
columns.description: The head branch of the workflow run branch.

columns.name: head_sha
columns.description: The head sha of the workflow run.

columns.name: html_url
columns.description: The address for the organization's GitHub web page.

columns.name: jobs_url
columns.description: The address for the workflow job GitHub web page.

columns.name: logs_url
columns.description: The address for the workflow logs GitHub web page.

columns.name: rerun_url
columns.description: The address for workflow rerun GitHub web page.

columns.name: url
columns.description: The address for the workflow run GitHub web page.

columns.name: workflow_url
columns.description: The address for workflow GitHub web page.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Time when the workflow run was created.

columns.name: head_commit
columns.description: The head commit details for workflow run.

columns.name: head_repository
columns.description: The head repository info for the workflow run.

columns.name: pull_requests
columns.description: The pull request details for the workflow run.

columns.name: repository
columns.description: The repository info for the workflow run.

columns.name: run_started_at
columns.description: Time when the workflow run was started.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Time when the workflow run was updated.

columns.name: actor
columns.description: The user whom initiated the first instance of this workflow run.

columns.name: actor_login
columns.description: The login of the user whom initiated the first instance of the workflow run.

columns.name: triggering_actor
columns.description: The user whom initiated the latest instance of this workflow run.

columns.name: triggering_actor_login
columns.description: The login of the user whom initiated the latest instance of this workflow run.
